title: Mobile-Based Language Microlearning Course: Integrating Remote Education and Community Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Aimed at improving language skills for adapting to multicultural work environments, where learners have significant time constraints, higher smartphone accessibility than PC, and require motivation through community-based collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can complete 10-minute language learning content five times per week using mobile apps
Learners engage in at least three language practice conversations with peer learners using real-time voice messaging functions
Learners accurately comprehend 80% or more of the 5 core vocabulary items and expressions per week through formative quizzes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
